channel.title: Here is Something to make everyones life 10x easier
channel.description:
As i found out about something called a effective file search it is very simple to use first step
And im very sorry if i posted this in rong section please tell me where i can post it if it is in rong section thank you sorry for the misunderstanding
Download link: http://download.cnet.com/Effective-File-Search/3000-2248_4-10056419.html
Explains itself [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2e31qg1.png[/img]
Explaints itself [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/10xzog8.png[/img]
thank you if this helped just rep me and give good comments dont comment if u didnt like my help atleast i tried to help unlike all those other people!
